# 1889 Chicago White Stockings season

| league_place = 3rd
| owner = Albert Spalding
| manager = Cap Anson

| next_season = 1890 Chicago Colts season
|}}
The 1889 Chicago White Stockings season was the 18th season of the Chicago White Stockings franchise, the 14th in the National League, and the fifth at the first West Side Park. The White Stockings finished third in the National League with a record of 67â€“65.
